targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(o.vn) as "จำนวนคนไข้ทั้งหมด " FROM 
ovst o
WHERE   o.vstdate between '2024-10-01' and '2025-09-30'

panels.title: จำนวน คนไข้นอก ที้งปีงบประมาณ

matcher.options: จำนวนครั้ง

sortBy.displayName: ประมาณการรายได้

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    `ยาสมุนไพร`,
    `จำนวนคน`,
    `จำนวนครั้ง`,
    `ประมาณการรายได้`
FROM (
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9372629','9415240','9429256') THEN 'ยาแก้ไอมะขามป้อม'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9411015') THEN 'เถาวัลย์เปรียง'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9093729','9025742') THEN 'ขมิ้นชัน'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9411036','9401800') THEN 'ฟ้าทะลายโจร'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9429273') THEN 'ลูกประคบ'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9423623') THEN 'กลีเซอรีนพญายอ'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9411275') THEN 'เพชรสังฆาต'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9386723','9025735') THEN 'กล้วย'
            WHEN sks_drug_code IN ('9098156') THEN 'เจลว่านหางจรเข้'
        END AS `ยาสมุนไพร`,
        COUNT(DISTINCT o.hn) AS `จำนวนคน`,
        COUNT(op.icode) AS `จำนวนครั้ง`,
        FORMAT(SUM(
            CASE
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9372629','9415240','9429256') THEN 84
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411015') THEN 60
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9093729','9025742') THEN 56
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411036','9401800') THEN 92
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9429273') THEN 100
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9423623') THEN 33
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411275') THEN 204
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9386723','9025735') THEN 32.5
                WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9098156') THEN 53
                ELSE 0
            END
        ), 2) AS `ประมาณการรายได้`
    FROM ovst o
    LEFT JOIN opitemrece op ON op.vn = o.vn AND op.vstdate = o.vstdate
    LEFT JOIN drugitems d ON d.icode = op.icode
    LEFT JOIN pttype p ON p.pttype = o.pttype
    WHERE
        o.vstdate BETWEEN '2025-03-01' AND '2025-09-30'
        AND d.sks_drug_code IN ('9372629','9415240','9429256','9411015','9093729',
'9025742','9411036','9401800','9429273','9423623','9411275','9386723','9025735','9098156')
        AND p.hipdata_code IN ('WEL', 'UCS')
    GROUP BY
        `ยาสมุนไพร`

) AS subquery_results
UNION ALL
SELECT
    'รวมทั้งหมด' AS `ยาสมุนไพร`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.hn) AS `จำนวนคน`,
    COUNT(op.icode) AS `จำนวนครั้ง`,
    FORMAT(SUM(
        CASE
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9372629','9415240','9429256') THEN 84
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411015') THEN 60
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9093729','9025742') THEN 56
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411036','9401800') THEN 92
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9429273') THEN 100
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9423623') THEN 33
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9411275') THEN 204
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9386723','9025735') THEN 32.5
            WHEN d.sks_drug_code IN ('9098156') THEN 53
            ELSE 0
        END
    ), 2) AS `ประมาณการรายได้`
FROM ovst o
LEFT JOIN opitemrece op ON op.vn = o.vn AND op.vstdate = o.vstdate
LEFT JOIN drugitems d ON d.icode = op.icode
LEFT JOIN pttype p ON p.pttype = o.pttype
WHERE
    o.vstdate BETWEEN '2025-03-01' AND '2025-09-30'
    AND d.sks_drug_code IN ('9372629','9415240','9429256','9411015','9093729','9025742','9411036',
'9401800','9429273','9423623','9411275','9386723','9025735','9098156')
    AND p.hipdata_code IN ('WEL', 'UCS');

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้ยาสมุนไพร 32 รายการ เริ่ม 1มีค68  2568

matcher.options: จำนวนครั้ง

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 1 THEN 'นวด + ประคบ'
        WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 0 THEN 'นวด'
        WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '20' AND h3_check.has_11 = 0 THEN 'ประคบ'
        WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '00' THEN 'อบสมุนไพร'
    END AS `รายการ`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT h2.hn) AS `จำนวนคน`,
    COUNT(h3.health_med_operation_item_id) AS `จำนวนครั้ง`,
    FORMAT(
        SUM(
            CASE
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 1 THEN 130.46
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 0 THEN 150
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '20' AND h3_check.has_11 = 0 THEN 75
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '00' THEN 75
                ELSE 0
            END
        ), 2
    ) AS `รายได้`
FROM health_med_service_operation h1
JOIN health_med_service h2 ON h2.health_med_service_id = h1.health_med_service_id
LEFT JOIN health_med_operation_item h3 ON h3.health_med_operation_item_id = h1.health_med_operation_item_id
LEFT JOIN vn_stat v ON h2.hn = v.hn AND h2.service_date = v.vstdate
LEFT JOIN pttype p ON v.pttype = p.pttype
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        h2.health_med_service_id,
        MAX(CASE WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_20,
        MAX(CASE WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_11
    FROM health_med_service_operation h1
    JOIN health_med_service h2 ON h2.health_med_service_id = h1.health_med_service_id
    JOIN health_med_operation_item h3 ON h3.health_med_operation_item_id = h1.health_med_operation_item_id
    WHERE h2.service_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
      AND h3.health_med_operation_item_code IN ('11', '20')
    GROUP BY h2.health_med_service_id
) AS h3_check ON h3_check.health_med_service_id = h2.health_med_service_id
WHERE
    h2.service_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
    AND p.hipdata_code IN ('WEL', 'UCS')
    AND h3.health_med_operation_item_code IN ('11', '20', '00')
GROUP BY
    `รายการ`
HAVING `รายการ` IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'รวมทั้งหมด' AS `รายการ`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT h2.hn) AS `จำนวนคน`,
    COUNT(h3.health_med_operation_item_id) AS `จำนวนครั้ง`,
    FORMAT(
        SUM(
            CASE
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 1 THEN 130.46
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' AND h3_check.has_20 = 0 THEN 150
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '20' AND h3_check.has_11 = 0 THEN 75
                WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '00' THEN 75
                ELSE 0
            END
        ), 2
    ) AS `รายได้`
FROM health_med_service_operation h1
JOIN health_med_service h2 ON h2.health_med_service_id = h1.health_med_service_id
LEFT JOIN health_med_operation_item h3 ON h3.health_med_operation_item_id = h1.health_med_operation_item_id
LEFT JOIN vn_stat v ON h2.hn = v.hn AND h2.service_date = v.vstdate
LEFT JOIN pttype p ON v.pttype = p.pttype
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        h2.health_med_service_id,
        MAX(CASE WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_20,
        MAX(CASE WHEN h3.health_med_operation_item_code = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_11
    FROM health_med_service_operation h1
    JOIN health_med_service h2 ON h2.health_med_service_id = h1.health_med_service_id
    JOIN health_med_operation_item h3 ON h3.health_med_operation_item_id = h1.health_med_operation_item_id
    WHERE h2.service_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
      AND h3.health_med_operation_item_code IN ('11', '20')
    GROUP BY h2.health_med_service_id
) AS h3_check ON h3_check.health_med_service_id = h2.health_med_service_id
WHERE
    h2.service_date BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
    AND p.hipdata_code IN ('WEL', 'UCS')
    AND h3.health_med_operation_item_code IN ('11', '20', '00');

panels.title: รายได้จากนวด, ประคบ, อบ (เฉพาะสิทธิ WEL, UCS)  ปีงบประมาณ 2568

matcher.options: จำนวนครั้ง

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้ ตามสิทธิผู้ป่วย  ปีงบประมาณ 2568

matcher.options: จำนวนครั้ง

targets.rawSql:
WITH vaccine_income AS (
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('106') THEN 'dTผู้ใหญ่'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('061', '073') THEN 'MMR'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('D21', 'D22', 'D23', 'D24') THEN 'DTP-HB+Hib'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('R11', 'R12', 'R21', 'R22', 'R23') THEN 'Rota'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('081', '082', '083', '084', '085') THEN 'OPV'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('034', '035') THEN ' DTP'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('J11', 'J12') THEN ' LAJE'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('815') THEN 'Full'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('023', '024') THEN 'dT ป.6'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('311', 'HPVC21', 'HPVC22', 'HPVC23', 'HPVV21', 'HPVV22',
            'HPVV23', 'HPVG41', 'HPVG42', 'HPVG43', 'HPVG91', 'HPVG92', 'HPVG93') THEN ' HPV'
            WHEN pv.export_vaccine_code IN ('I11', 'I12', 'I13') THEN ' IPV'
            ELSE 'อื่นๆ'
        END AS vaccine_group,
        o.hn,
        v1.vn
    FROM
        ovst_vaccine v1
    INNER JOIN ovst o ON v1.vn = o.vn
    INNER JOIN person_vaccine pv ON v1.person_vaccine_id = pv.person_vaccine_id
    WHERE
        o.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
        AND pv.export_vaccine_code IN (
            '106', '061', '073', 'D21', 'D22', 'D23', 'D24', 'R11', 'R12', 'R21', 'R22',
            'R23', '081', '082', '083', '084', '085', '034', '035', 'J11', 'J12', '815',
            '023', '024', '311', 'HPVC21', 'HPVC22', 'HPVC23', 'HPVV21', 'HPVV22', 'HPVV23',
             'HPVG41', 'HPVG42', 'HPVG43', 'HPVG91', 'HPVG92', 'HPVG93', 'I11', 'I12', 'I13'
        )
),
grouped_by_vaccine AS (
    SELECT
        vaccine_group,
        COUNT(DISTINCT hn) AS patient_count,
        COUNT(vn) AS visit_count,
        CASE
            WHEN vaccine_group = 'วัคซีนผู้ใหญ่' THEN COUNT(DISTINCT hn) * 20
            ELSE COUNT(vn) * 20
        END AS estimated_income
    FROM
        vaccine_income
    GROUP BY
        vaccine_group
),
summary AS (
    SELECT
        vaccine_group AS 'วัคซีน',
        FORMAT(patient_count, 0) AS 'จำนวนคน',
        FORMAT(visit_count, 0) AS 'จำนวนครั้ง',
        FORMAT(estimated_income, 2) AS 'รายได้'
    FROM
        grouped_by_vaccine
    WHERE
        visit_count > 0
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
        ' รวมทั้งหมด -',
        FORMAT(SUM(patient_count), 0),
        FORMAT(SUM(visit_count), 0),
        FORMAT(SUM(estimated_income), 2)
    FROM
        grouped_by_vaccine
)
SELECT * FROM summary;

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้ จาก  วัคซีน ปีงบประมาณ 2568

targets.rawSql:
(
    SELECT
        'ยาเม็ด' AS `รายการ`,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_1' THEN 1 END) AS `ครั้ง`,
        SUM(CASE WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_1' THEN 120 ELSE 0 END) AS `รายได้`
    FROM opitemrece o
    LEFT JOIN drugitems d ON d.icode = o.icode
    LEFT JOIN pttype p ON p.pttype = o.pttype
    WHERE
        o.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
        AND p.hipdata_code IN ('UCS', 'WEL')
        AND d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_1'
)

UNION ALL

(
    SELECT
        'ยาฉีด' AS `รายการ`,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_4' THEN 1 END) AS `ครั้ง`,
        SUM(CASE WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_4' THEN 60 ELSE 0 END) AS `รายได้`
    FROM opitemrece o
    LEFT JOIN drugitems d ON d.icode = o.icode
    LEFT JOIN pttype p ON p.pttype = o.pttype
    WHERE
        o.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
        AND p.hipdata_code IN ('UCS', 'WEL')
        AND d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_4'
)

UNION ALL

(
    SELECT
        'รวมทั้งหมด' AS `รายการ`,
        COUNT(d.nhso_adp_code) AS `ครั้ง`,
        SUM(CASE
            WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_1' THEN 120
            WHEN d.nhso_adp_code = 'FP003_4' THEN 60
        END) AS `รายได้`
    FROM opitemrece o
    LEFT JOIN drugitems d ON d.icode = o.icode
    LEFT JOIN pttype p ON p.pttype = o.pttype
    WHERE
        o.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
        AND p.hipdata_code IN ('UCS', 'WEL')
        AND d.nhso_adp_code IN ('FP003_1', 'FP003_4')
);

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้ จาก  ยาคุมกำเนิด ปีงบประมาณ 2568

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE lo.lab_items_code
        WHEN '4020' THEN 'ตับอักเสบB'
        WHEN '4022' THEN 'ตับอักเสบC'
        ELSE 'รวมทั้งหมด'
    END AS 'รายการ',
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.hn) AS 'คน',
    COUNT(o.vn) AS 'ครั้ง',
    COUNT(o.vn) * 50 AS 'รายได้'
FROM
    ovst o
LEFT JOIN
    lab_head lh ON lh.vn = o.vn
LEFT JOIN
    lab_order lo ON lo.lab_order_number = lh.lab_order_number
WHERE
    lo.lab_items_code IN ('4020', '4022')
    AND o.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
GROUP BY
    lo.lab_items_code WITH ROLLUP;

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้ จาก HPV HB HC ปีงบประมาณ 2568

targets.rawSql:
(
    -- รายละเอียดรายบริการคัดกรอง/ส่งเสริมสุขภาพ (ADP)
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '14001' THEN 'บริการยาเสริมธาตุเหล็ก' 
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '12004' THEN 'บริการเจาะเเลือดตรวจ TCหรือHDL'
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '13001' THEN 'ตรวจคัดกรองโลหิตจาง CBC,HCT หญิงอายุ 13-24 ปี'
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '15001' THEN 'บริการเคลือบฟลูออรไค์กลุ่มเสี่ยง 25-59 ปี'
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30014' THEN 'คทดสอบหญิงตั้งครรภ์'
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30015' THEN 'บริการตรวจหลังคลอด'
            WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30016' THEN 'จ่ายยาtriferdine หญิงหลังคลอด'
            ELSE 'ไม่ระบุ'
        END AS 'รายการ',
        FORMAT(COUNT(DISTINCT v.hn), 0) AS 'คน',
        FORMAT(COUNT(DISTINCT v.vn), 0) AS 'ครั้ง',
        FORMAT(SUM(
            CASE
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '14001' THEN 80
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '12003' THEN 40
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '12004' THEN 160
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '13001' THEN 65
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '15001' THEN 100
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30014' THEN 75
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30015' THEN 150
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30016' THEN 135
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9001' THEN 500
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9002' THEN 2500
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9004' THEN 600
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9005' THEN 60
                ELSE 0
            END
        ), 2) AS 'รายได้'
    FROM vn_stat v
    JOIN opitemrece o ON o.vn = v.vn
    JOIN nondrugitems n ON n.icode = o.icode
    WHERE v.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
      AND n.nhso_adp_code IN ('14001', '12003', '12004', '13001', '15001', '30014',
       '30015', '30016', '9001', '9002', '9004', '9005')
    GROUP BY n.nhso_adp_code
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT v.vn) > 0
)
UNION ALL
(
    -- สรุปรวมของบริการคัดกรอง/ส่งเสริมสุขภาพ (ADP) (แสดงถ้ามีข้อมูลรวม)
    SELECT
        'รวมคัดกรอง/ส่งเสริมสุขภาพ (ADP)' AS group_name,
        FORMAT(COUNT(DISTINCT v.hn), 0) AS patient_count,
        FORMAT(COUNT(DISTINCT v.vn), 0) AS visit_count,
        FORMAT(SUM(
            CASE
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '14001' THEN 80
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '12003' THEN 40
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '12004' THEN 160
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '13001' THEN 65
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '15001' THEN 100
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30014' THEN 75
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30015' THEN 150
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '30016' THEN 135
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9001' THEN 500
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9002' THEN 2500
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9004' THEN 600
                WHEN n.nhso_adp_code = '9005' THEN 60
                ELSE 0
            END
        ), 2) AS estimated_income
    FROM vn_stat v
    JOIN opitemrece o ON o.vn = v.vn
    JOIN nondrugitems n ON n.icode = o.icode
    WHERE v.vstdate BETWEEN '2024-10-01' AND '2025-09-30'
      AND n.nhso_adp_code IN ('14001', '12003', '12004', '13001', '15001', '30014', '30015',
       '30016', '9001', '9002', '9004', '9005')
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT v.vn) > 0
)

panels.title: ประมาณการรายได้จากบริการคัดกรอง/ส่งเสริมสุขภาพ (ADP) ปีงบประมาณ 2568

title: แสดงจัดเก็บรายได้ รพ.สต.บ้านหายโศก ปีงบประมาณ 2568
